nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_526
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I keep the picture where I can see it every day as it reminds me of my university days.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_527
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: In some countries, what is called "equality" does not really mean equal rights for all people.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_528
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He is used to keeping a dictionary at hand so that he can find the meaning of new words he comes across.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_529
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: When confronted with personal pressure, you should stand firmly for your belief that you will reach your ultimate goal.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_530
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: In other words, be yourself and face reality, but don't sell out to convenience.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_531
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I don't like those people who always rely on external factors in order to feel good about themselves.
